programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington's Treasure Hunt / Paddington's Taste of Italy) S2 (n°20)
programme.desc: «Paddington's Treasure Hunt / Paddington's Taste of Italy»Jonathan & Paddington find a treasure map in a bottle on the lake! Judy & Toq also find a treasure map, but who will find the treasure first? // Mr. Gruber has always wanted to go to Italy & Paddington sets about helping his friend achieve his dream!

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington's Radio Show / Paddington's Butler) S2 (n°22)
programme.desc: «Paddington's Radio Show / Paddington's Butler»Mr. Curry's & Paddington's favorite radio show is cancelled - how will they ever know the ending now? // Mr. Curry ends up being Paddington's butler for the day - but he's better giving orders than taking them.

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington and the Talent Show) S1 (n°10)
programme.desc: «Paddington and the Talent Show»Paddington enters Mr. Brown into the Townhall talent contest. However, Mr. Brown gets stage fright and Paddington must come to the rescue.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Mystères) S2 (5/52)
programme.desc: «Mystères»Après avoir regardé leur émission de télévision préférée, Peppa et George veulent, eux-aussi, devenir des détectives fameux. Papa Pig leur donne un mystère à élucider...

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Les bulles) S2 (1/52)
programme.desc: «Les bulles»Peppa et George aiment bien les bulles de leur boisson pétillante. Maman Cochon les envoie dans le jardin pour jouer avec ces bulles...

programme.title: Bubulle Guppies (Un éléphant, ça trompe énormément) S3 (6/26)
programme.desc: «Un éléphant, ça trompe énormément»Oh no! Nonny's glasses are broken! When it is made, Nonny is determined to get it himself. But that means using his other four senses to find the eyewear store before it closes!

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (La chasse au trésor de Blue) S2 (n°3)
programme.desc: «La chasse au trésor de Blue»Cap'n McStripes (that's ''pirate'' for Josh) and Blue are playing pirates, but where is the treasure?! We play Blue's Clues to figure it out.

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (Blue fait de la pâtisserie) S2 (n°4)
programme.desc: «Blue fait de la pâtisserie»It's a nighttime game of Blue's Clues to figure out Blue's favorite part of bedtime! As we search for clues, we help Blue and Polka Dots get clean, comfy, cozy and ready for bed.

programme.title: Santiago des mers (Le Carnaval / Le Cheval des Mers) S1 (21/21)
programme.desc: «Le Carnaval / Le Cheval des Mers»The biggest party of the year could be cancelled after Escarlata la Pirata freezes the high seas! // Bonnie Bones is on the run with the museum's priceless treasures, but Santi and crew won't let her get far.

programme.title: Santiago des mers (The Golden Banana Treasure) S1 (n°9)
programme.desc: «The Golden Banana Treasure»Santi and crew navigate the tricky Banana Island to save a baby monkey and its treasure from Enrique.

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Captain Varech) S1 (n°11)
programme.desc: «Captain Varech»Captain Kelp: As Super Shark and Captain Kelp, Baby Shark and William set out to save playtime-but is Captain Kelp just a sidekick? (S1, ep 9a).

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Rainy Day Roundup) S1 (n°13)
programme.desc: «Rainy Day Roundup»The Rainy Day Round-Up: When an underwater storm rains on Baby Shark and William's fun, they doubt whether they can have an adventure indoors. (S1, ep 13a).

programme.title: Mini Chef (Mac and Cheese) S1 (n°8)
programme.desc: «Mac and Cheese»Mac and Cheese: Tiny Chef makes rainy day Mac N Cheese but a leaky roof creates chaos in his tree stump kitchen! (S1, ep 8a).

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Le tresor du palais de glace / Au secours de Ryder) S8 (9/24)
programme.desc: «Le tresor du palais de glace / Au secours de Ryder»Mayor Humdinger tricks people to sail icy waters in search of an Antarctic treasure but they all need rescued when they get stranded on shore. // The pups need to rescue Ryder and Alex when they get out of control on a rocket-powered ATV.

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington et la chasse au trésor) S2 (20/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington et la chasse au trésor»Jonathan & Paddington find a treasure map in a bottle on the lake! Judy & Toq also find a treasure map, but who will find the treasure first?

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Grenouilles, vers et papillons) S1 (17/52)
programme.desc: «Grenouilles, vers et papillons»Peppa and George find frogs, worms and butterflies in Grandma Pig and Grandpa Pig's garden and they play with them.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Les déguisements) S1 (18/52)
programme.desc: «Les déguisements»Peppa and George make everyone laugh when they dress up as Mama Pig and Papa Pig.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Les nouvelles chaussures) S1 (19/52)
programme.desc: «Les nouvelles chaussures»Peppa loses her shoes. She's getting new red shoes. She's so happy she doesn't want to take them off.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Greedy Gobbler) S1 (n°67)
programme.desc: «The Greedy Gobbler»The Greedy Gobbler: While Bubu and Christopher want to enjoy an hazelnut snack, their hazelnuts go missing! Then Anna, Froga and Ron's chocolate snack also disappears! (S1, ep 67).

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (A Longchair for Ron) S1 (n°68)
programme.desc: «A Longchair for Ron»A sleeping spider squats Ron's swing, and he can't take a nap. He laments to Anna and Froga that he wishes he had a deck chair to sleep on. This gives them the idea to surprise him with one.

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (La visite de Magenta) S1 (n°2)
programme.desc: «La visite de Magenta»Blue's friend Magenta is coming over today! We play Blue's Clues to figure out what Blue wants to do with Magenta. During our search for clues, we identify opposites and check out animal footprint with our friends Shovel & Pail.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Pups Save a Humdinger Doll / Pups Save a Sand Sculpture Contest) S9 (n°5)
programme.desc: «Pups Save a Humdinger Doll / Pups Save a Sand Sculpture Contest»With Tracker's help, the PAW Patrol must rescue Mayor Humdinger who has been mistaken for Big Hairy's missing toy doll. // When Mayor Humdinger tries to cheat at the Adventure Bay sand sculpture contest, his machine goes out-of-control.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Deux maires en détresse) S7 (15/26)
programme.desc: «Deux maires en détresse»Pups Save the Marooned Mayors: While out ice fishing in the North Country, Mayors Goodway and Humdinger, along with Chickaletta, get stuck in an ice crevasse. (S7, ep 15a).

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Héros d'un jour / Danse avec les robots) S1 (7/20)
programme.desc: «Héros d'un jour / Danse avec les robots»A meteor hits Earth and Mister Steel's heroic demeanor forces Deer Squad to save everyone. A dance competition in Middenbos turns into a mess.

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Den Build Disaster / Winter Lights) S2 (n°19)
programme.desc: «Den Build Disaster / Winter Lights»Kai tries to impress with his super den, but his leaf blower invention frightens the baby animals. // Lola's plan to help a family of hedgehogs over the winter doesn't go to plan when Sir Steel wants to brighten things up.

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington's Nature Club / Paddington's not Himself) S2 (n°19)
programme.desc: «Paddington's Nature Club / Paddington's not Himself»Mr. Curry wants to become a ranger leader & creates nature club to impress Ms. Potts but are his facts correct? // Paddington has a fall and loses his climbing confidence - without climbing he doesn't feel like himself at all - what can he do?

programme.title: Mini Chef (S'mores) S1 (n°4)
programme.desc: «S'mores»S'Mores: Tiny Chef makes S'Mores for a campout and overcomes his fear of the dark with help from his friends. (S1, ep 4b).

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Barba TV / Le muséum) S1 (n°23)
programme.desc: «Barba TV / Le muséum»The barbababies are glued to the TV. Since they love it so much, their parents encourage them to make their own shows. // The Barbapapa visit the museum of evolution. On the program: creation of the Earth, Precambrian submarine and... dinosaurs!

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Barbidou ne sait pas dire non / Le sosie) S1 (n°24)
programme.desc: «Barbidou ne sait pas dire non / Le sosie»Barbazoo is ready to help. But Barbabright and Barbabelle abuse his kindness and drive him crazy. // By chance, Barbazoo realizes he can imitate Barbapapa. He uses this opportunity to distribute chores to his brothers and sisters. Will they find out?

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Le voeu de l'étoile de mer filante / Le défi du requin) S1 (n°6)
programme.desc: «Le voeu de l'étoile de mer filante / Le défi du requin»Baby and friends set out to climb Wish Mountain in 'When You Wish Upon a Fish', then in 'Shark-Off', Shadow challenges Baby Shark to a Shark-Off to prove who's the sharkiest shark.

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Baby Shark, le maire) S1 (n°10)
programme.desc: «Baby Shark, le maire»Baby Mayor: The fate of the city's squidapple supply lies in Baby's fins when he accidentally assumes the role of Mayor on a big day. (S1, ep 8a).

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (An Endless Story) S1 (n°48)
programme.desc: «An Endless Story»Anna is reading Christopher and Froga a story - but when she gets to the end, they discover the last two pages are missing! After a search for the missing pages, they find out that one of them is blank.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Collection) S1 (n°19)
programme.desc: «The Collection»Upon seeing Ron's stick collection, Froga learns for the first time what "a collection" is. Anna would like to create one of her own. The others have all one sticks, bubbles, sounds, tools. They help Anna to find her memories with her friends.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Key) S1 (n°69)
programme.desc: «The Key»The Key: Because of her fear of spiders, Froga locks herself and Ron in the greenhouse to collecting Strawberries for the friends' Strawberry Snack time Musical Feast. (S1, ep 69).

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Fruits Surprise) S1 (n°70)
programme.desc: «Fruits Surprise»When Froga and Christopher realize that Anna and Bubu may be making a "fruit surprises" for Snack Time, they try everything they can to preserve the two surprises. Froga and Christopher realized how difficult preserving a surprise can be!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Spider) S1 (n°26)
programme.desc: «The Spider»Anna and Froga are completely freaked out when they learn a spider lives in Ron's treehouse with him! Ron tries his best to convince his friends that the spider is harmless.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Impatient Christopher) S1 (n°27)
programme.desc: «Impatient Christopher»Christopher can hardly wait for his birthday tomorrow, he delivers invitations to his friends, he tries to figure out what present they are preparing for him. Christopher learns that sleeping is the fastest way for tomorrow to come sooner!

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La fête de l'école) S1 (20/52)
programme.desc: «La fête de l'école»Peppa and her family go to the street fair at school and do all kinds of things there. Peppa and her friends have their face painted like tigers.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (L'anniversaire de maman Pig) S1 (21/52)
programme.desc: «L'anniversaire de maman Pig»It is Mummy Pig's birthday, and Peppa, George and Daddy Pig are planning a surprise.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le coucher) S2 (14/52)
programme.desc: «Le coucher»It's nearly time for bed. Peppa and George play outside for a tiny bit more. Then they are called in for their bath. After that, Peppa and George brush their teeth and get into bed, so Daddy Pig can read them a story. Soon they are fast asleep. Mummy Pig and Daddy Pig finally sit down to watch television, but it's been a long day and they are very sleepy too.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (L'embouteillage) S2 (13/52)
programme.desc: «L'embouteillage»Granny and Grandpa Pig have invited Peppa and her family to lunch. On the way, Peppa, George, Mummy Pig and Daddy Pig get caught in a very long traffic jam. They still haven't arrived by the time lunch is ready, so Grandpa Pig decides to bring the lunch to them - in his wheelbarrow. There's enough delicious food for everyone in the traffic jam.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Les fruits) S4 (45/52)
programme.desc: «Les fruits»Fruit: It is fruit day at the supermarket, and Miss Rabbit is making fruit smoothies.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (L'océan fuchsia / Zéro déchet) S1 (n°15)
programme.desc: «L'océan fuchsia / Zéro déchet»Chemical sprays are making the countryside rosy! The Barbapapas' build an aviary to protect sick birds. // When they see a beach covered with rubbish, the Barbapapa family decides to clean the beach and use the trash to make a miniature golf course.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Boris / Né pour être sauvage) S1 (3/52)
programme.desc: «Boris / Né pour être sauvage»The barbababies find a lost baby elephant and secretly look after it. How will Barbapapa and Barbamama react to Boris? // Boris the elephant misses home. The Barbapapa decide to bring him back to Africa. On the spot, they help Boris to acclimatize.

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (Le Grand Défi des 100 Oeufs) S4 (n°19)
programme.desc: «Le Grand Défi des 100 Oeufs»A visit to the King's castle goes awry when the King accidentally catapults himself far, far away! To bring him home, Blaze, AJ and the King's adorable pet dragon Zeek must transform into knights in shining armor!

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (Au feu, les pompiers !) S6 (9/24)
programme.desc: «Au feu, les pompiers !»When three fire emergencies break out across Axle City, it's up to Blaze to put 'em out - and to do it, he'll transform into the most epic fire rescue vehicles we've ever seen!

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (La moustache de Monsieur Hellinger / La fête foraine) S8 (5/26)
programme.desc: «La moustache de Monsieur Hellinger / La fête foraine»The Pups must help to find Mayor Humdinger's mustache after he accidentally shaves it off before it's about to be on the cover of a magazine. // When a carnival train gets stuck in a tunnel, it results in a mountainside funhouse-style wild ride.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Pups Save Katie and Some Kitties / Pups Save Helo Humdinger) S9 (n°17)
programme.desc: «Pups Save Katie and Some Kitties / Pups Save Helo Humdinger»When Mayor Humdinger tricks Katie into watching his kitties, an alarm is set off and the Paw Patrol must rescue them. // Mayor Humdinger swipes one of Ryder's early inventions - an aircraft and must be rescued from an out-of-control flight.

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Dinobot / Les Super Minis dans l'espace) S2 (20/20)
programme.desc: «Dinobot / Les Super Minis dans l'espace»Stu & Safia have a new pet which needs training - just one problem: it's a Dinobot and it takes the Deer Squad to stop it! // An adventure in space awaits the newest heroes in town when the Deer Squad take the Forest Squad with them on a mission.

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Moontaker) S2 (n°10)
programme.desc: «Moontaker»Moontaker: Lady Fluffpot wants a statue made of moon rock, but the deer know that messing with the moon is a bad idea! (S2, ep 10b).

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington's Treasure Hunt / Paddington's Taste of Italy) S2 (n°20)
programme.desc: «Paddington's Treasure Hunt / Paddington's Taste of Italy»Jonathan & Paddington find a treasure map in a bottle on the lake! Judy & Toq also find a treasure map, but who will find the treasure first? // Mr. Gruber has always wanted to go to Italy & Paddington sets about helping his friend achieve his dream!

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington's Radio Show / Paddington's Butler) S2 (n°22)
programme.desc: «Paddington's Radio Show / Paddington's Butler»Mr. Curry's & Paddington's favorite radio show is cancelled - how will they ever know the ending now? // Mr. Curry ends up being Paddington's butler for the day - but he's better giving orders than taking them.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Les vacances de Polly) S2 (3/52)
programme.desc: «Les vacances de Polly»Peppa et George s'occupent de Polly le perroquet en l'absence de leurs grands-parents, en vacances. Mais Polly profite de ce que les enfants sont partis chercher une glace pour prendre la poudre d'escampette...

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le vent d'automne) S2 (8/52)
programme.desc: «Le vent d'automne»It is a cold and windy day. At the park, all the leaves have turned red and yellow. It is so windy that Peppa's ball blows into the pond and George's hat blows into a tree.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Mystères) S2 (5/52)
programme.desc: «Mystères»Après avoir regardé leur émission de télévision préférée, Peppa et George veulent, eux-aussi, devenir des détectives fameux. Papa Pig leur donne un mystère à élucider...

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Les bulles) S2 (1/52)
programme.desc: «Les bulles»Peppa et George aiment bien les bulles de leur boisson pétillante. Maman Cochon les envoie dans le jardin pour jouer avec ces bulles...

programme.title: Bubulle Guppies (Un éléphant, ça trompe énormément) S3 (6/26)
programme.desc: «Un éléphant, ça trompe énormément»Oh no! Nonny's glasses are broken! When it is made, Nonny is determined to get it himself. But that means using his other four senses to find the eyewear store before it closes!

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (La chasse au trésor de Blue) S2 (n°3)
programme.desc: «La chasse au trésor de Blue»Cap'n McStripes (that's ''pirate'' for Josh) and Blue are playing pirates, but where is the treasure?! We play Blue's Clues to figure it out.

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (Blue fait de la pâtisserie) S2 (n°4)
programme.desc: «Blue fait de la pâtisserie»It's a nighttime game of Blue's Clues to figure out Blue's favorite part of bedtime! As we search for clues, we help Blue and Polka Dots get clean, comfy, cozy and ready for bed.

programme.title: Santiago des mers (Le Carnaval / Le Cheval des Mers) S1 (21/21)
programme.desc: «Le Carnaval / Le Cheval des Mers»The biggest party of the year could be cancelled after Escarlata la Pirata freezes the high seas! // Bonnie Bones is on the run with the museum's priceless treasures, but Santi and crew won't let her get far.

programme.title: Santiago des mers (The Golden Banana Treasure) S1 (n°9)
programme.desc: «The Golden Banana Treasure»Santi and crew navigate the tricky Banana Island to save a baby monkey and its treasure from Enrique.

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Captain Varech) S1 (n°11)
programme.desc: «Captain Varech»Captain Kelp: As Super Shark and Captain Kelp, Baby Shark and William set out to save playtime-but is Captain Kelp just a sidekick? (S1, ep 9a).

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Rainy Day Roundup) S1 (n°13)
programme.desc: «Rainy Day Roundup»The Rainy Day Round-Up: When an underwater storm rains on Baby Shark and William's fun, they doubt whether they can have an adventure indoors. (S1, ep 13a).

programme.title: Mini Chef (Mac and Cheese) S1 (n°8)
programme.desc: «Mac and Cheese»Mac and Cheese: Tiny Chef makes rainy day Mac N Cheese but a leaky roof creates chaos in his tree stump kitchen! (S1, ep 8a).

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Le tresor du palais de glace / Au secours de Ryder) S8 (9/24)
programme.desc: «Le tresor du palais de glace / Au secours de Ryder»Mayor Humdinger tricks people to sail icy waters in search of an Antarctic treasure but they all need rescued when they get stranded on shore. // The pups need to rescue Ryder and Alex when they get out of control on a rocket-powered ATV.

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington et la chasse au trésor) S2 (20/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington et la chasse au trésor»Jonathan & Paddington find a treasure map in a bottle on the lake! Judy & Toq also find a treasure map, but who will find the treasure first?

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Les crêpes) S1 (29/52)
programme.desc: «Les crêpes»Mummy Pig makes pancakes, and Peppa and George help, but Daddy Pig flips his pancake so high it sticks to the ceiling.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La garderie à domicile) S1 (30/52)
programme.desc: «La garderie à domicile»Peppa goes to her first ballet lesson, and meets her friends there. She decides to teach Mummy Pig and Daddy Pig to dance but finds out they have some moves of their own.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La leçon de danse) S1 (31/52)
programme.desc: «La leçon de danse»Peppa goes to her first ballet lesson, and meets her friends there. She decides to teach Mummy Pig and Daddy Pig to dance but finds out they have some moves of their own.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Bubu's New Blue Jeans) S1 (n°71)
programme.desc: «Bubu's New Blue Jeans»Christopher has prepared his annual obstacle race and is excited for all the friends to participate. Bubu's new blue jeans are still drying so he has to wear his brand-new pair to the event, he becomes overly concerned of getting them dirty.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Everywhere at Once) S1 (n°72)
programme.desc: «Everywhere at Once»Anna has prepared her ice cream for everyone but forgets to place it in the freezer. - as she is trying to help all her friends at once, the ice cream melts! Is it ruined or can it be saved?

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (L'herbe est toujours plus verte ailleurs / Quand je serai grand) S1 (n°11)
programme.desc: «L'herbe est toujours plus verte ailleurs / Quand je serai grand»Barbabright coats the house in magic product to prevent water leakage. The next day, The house deflates like a balloon. // A bird builds its nest on Barbazoo's belly. Barbazoo wants to become a big tree to shelter animals. This becomes complicated.

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (Blue est triste) S1 (6/17)
programme.desc: «Blue est triste»Blue's feeling sad, so we play Blue's Clues to figure out why. Along the way to figuring out Blue's Clues, we help our Felt Friends and Blues' friends from her school deal with emotions and feelings in different situations.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Pups Save a T-Rex Tyke / Pups Save a Playful Elephant Calf) S9 (n°15)
programme.desc: «Pups Save a T-Rex Tyke / Pups Save a Playful Elephant Calf»When a baby T-Rex gets lost, Ryder and the pups go on a daring mission to the Dino Wilds to help find him. // When Everest joins the Paw Patrol for a visit to the jungle, she makes friends with a clumsy elephant calf and then must help rescue him.

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (L'Échangeur / Touche pas à mon oeuf) S1 (n°9)
programme.desc: «L'Échangeur / Touche pas à mon oeuf»Professor Scratch's Switcheroo device causes chaos when Sir Steel uses it to get Deer Squad's Powers. // Rammy must learn to trust his friends when he chooses to take care of an abandoned egg, all while dealing with a mysterious ant invasion.

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Bonsoir, Platino-ville / Métalzilla) S1 (1/20)
programme.desc: «Bonsoir, Platino-ville / Métalzilla»Mr. Steel does not want to get out of bed and has Professor Sketch build a gigantic pair of sunglasses to block the sun. During a parade, Mr. Steel inflates his balloon in such a way that it disrupts the entire city.

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddingtons huisdierhotel / Paddington gaat golfen) S2 (n°24)
programme.desc: «Paddingtons huisdierhotel / Paddington gaat golfen»Paddington opens Windsor Gardens' first ever pet hotel when he has Lucky to stay over. // Baaz has set up a mini golf course at the park, but is it really unbeatable like he says and how should you hold a club Paddington?

programme.title: Mini Chef (S'Mores / Guacamole) S1 (n°1)
programme.desc: «S'Mores / Guacamole»Tiny Chef hosts his own tiny cooking show, and with his best friends Olly, Ruby and Henry, cooks up tasty dishes and amazing adventures, putting love into every dish he makes.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Barbidur n'est pas en forme / Patience Barbidur...) S1 (n°25)
programme.desc: «Barbidur n'est pas en forme / Patience Barbidur...»Following a misadventure, Barbabravo is unable to transform at all. The whole family unites to help him. // Barbabravo can't stay put and is unable to focus one an activity for very long. Barbalala offers to teach him control. Will she succeed?

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Les sept aliments / Un portrait au poil) S1 (n°26)
programme.desc: «Les sept aliments / Un portrait au poil»The Barbababies think their food can make them change colours and shapes. They decide to find the right food for each of them. // Barbabeau lacks inspiration, he can't create anymore. The whole family helps by suggesting new subjects to paint.

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Un artiste ne baisse jamais les nageoires / Détective Baby Shark) S1 (n°7)
programme.desc: «Un artiste ne baisse jamais les nageoires / Détective Baby Shark»When Goldie's feeling down, Baby and friends decide to put on a musical to help her shine. // When Grandma's shortcake goes missing before the bake-off, it's a case for Detective Baby Shark and William Watson!

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (The Present) S1 (n°15)
programme.desc: «The Present»The Present: Baby Shark goes undercover to figure out the perfect gift for Mummy Shark. (S1, ep 15b).

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Apple Picking) S1 (n°49)
programme.desc: «Apple Picking»The apples on the apple tree are ripe and the friends are super excited to go to pick them! They will make puree, juice, tarts, but also eat them straight! But the tree has grown since last year and the apples are hard to reach...

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Fixing Things) S1 (n°20)
programme.desc: «Fixing Things»Bubu catches a cold, he's unable to fix Ron's spinning top and Christopher's broken piano. While Bubu is resting, she "fixes" the broken items for him. Christopher's piano starts playing bubbles, Froga realizes she should leave the fixing to Bubu.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Giant Strawberry) S1 (n°75)
programme.desc: «The Giant Strawberry»When Froga discovers an amazing oversized strawberry in her garden, she quickly becomes obsessed with it. Things come to a head when Froga discovers a bunch more giant strawberries and even Anna is driven away.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Quiet Game) S1 (n°76)
programme.desc: «The Quiet Game»After talking so much to her plants, Froga decides to save her voice by playing THE QUIET GAME. When she lays out the objective that her friends need to try to make her talk - it becomes a fun challenge for the gang to get her to crack.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Statue of Friendship) S1 (n°28)
programme.desc: «The Statue of Friendship»Anna is inspired to create a statue of Froga but she runs out of clay. On her search to find more, she and her friends agree to each make their own special statues out of different materials. The best statue to build is one they build together!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Froga's Hat) S1 (n°29)
programme.desc: «Froga's Hat»Froga finds a sun hat she thought she lost forever and organizes a celebration picnic! But when the precious hat gets stained with jam, Froga's friends try to fix it - only making things worse. In the end, Anna's solution is the best of all.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le camping) S1 (35/52)
programme.desc: «Le camping»Peppa and her family go camping, but Daddy Pig is too big to get into the tent. Daddy Pig likes sleeping under the stars, until it starts to rain.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La princesse fatiguée) S1 (36/52)
programme.desc: «La princesse fatiguée»Papa Pig tells Peppa and George a story about a sleepy princess. In the story Peppa is the princess, George is the prince, Mama Pig is the queen and Papa Pig is the king.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Les flaques d'eau de mer) S2 (10/52)
programme.desc: «Les flaques d'eau de mer»Granny Pig et Grandpa Pig ont emmené Peppa et George à la plage. Les enfants trouvent des flaques d'eau de mer et Peppa vient au secours d'un petit poisson qui était prisonnier de l'une d'elles. Elle le rejette à la mer et entreprend de creuser son propre petit bassin d'eau de mer...

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le jour de sortie de Teddy) S2 (4/52)
programme.desc: «Le jour de sortie de Teddy»Peppa et George emmènent leurs jouets préférés en pique-nique...

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le ballon de George) S4 (46/52)
programme.desc: «Le ballon de George»Peppa and Suzy have nothing to do, and are bored. Daddy Pig finds them an old box of garden games to play with. But not all the games are easy for little George.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Hiccupism / Silence please) S1 (n°16)
programme.desc: «Hiccupism / Silence please»Barbabeau can't paint. He has a hiccup he can't get rid of. Just when he's about to give up, he accidentally creates a new artistic movement. // Barbalib wants to compete in a writing contest but his brothers and sisters stop her from concentrating.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Making Bread / From One Pit to Another) S1 (4/52)
programme.desc: «Making Bread / From One Pit to Another»Barbapapa wants to teach his children to make bread, but things don't go as planned... // The Barbababies plant an avocado tree. However, it takes years before the first harvest. Barbabright has an idea to save time that may well lead to...disaster.

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (L'île au trésor perdu) S5 (1/20)
programme.desc: «L'île au trésor perdu»Somewhere, on The Island of Lost Treasure, there are incredible riches just waiting to be discovered. And Blaze and Darington are determined to be the first to find them!

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (Autoneige Blaze, à la rescousse !) S6 (n°15)
programme.desc: «Autoneige Blaze, à la rescousse !»When a big ski mishap gets Crusher and Pickle stuck super far away, Blaze and AJ will perform a daring snow rescue to save the day.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Pups Save the Tooth Fairy / Pups Solve the Mystery of the Missing Art) S9 (n°7)
programme.desc: «Pups Save the Tooth Fairy / Pups Solve the Mystery of the Missing Art»Julius loses his tooth and has a dream that the Paw Patrol saves a bumbling Tooth Fairy. // When all the paintings mysteriously disappear from the Art Museum festival, the PAW Patrol must solve the Missing Art Mystery and return all the paintings.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Pups Save the Hatchlings / Pups Save a Wrongway Farmhand) S9 (n°8)
programme.desc: «Pups Save the Hatchlings / Pups Save a Wrongway Farmhand»When Mayor Humdinger decides to make the world's biggest omelet, he accidentally orders the wrong kind of eggs - ones that hatch. // Traveling Travis volunteers to watch Farmer Yumi and Farmer Al's Farm and characteristically messes up everything.

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Il faut sauver les abeilles / Le Canard Robot) S1 (n°2)
programme.desc: «Il faut sauver les abeilles / Le Canard Robot»When the bees are in need, Bobbi takes action. Bees are important, and without them there are no flowers, no fruit, and no kaki flaps! Kai takes care of the ducklings but gets in trouble when he leaves that task to Robo-Duck.
